SELECT ROWNUM, BID, BNAME, BOPEN_STATUS, BINTRO, MID, MNAME, CNAME, BOARDID, BCONTENT, BDATE, PID, EDIT_NAME, FTYPE, FILE_SRC, FID, A_EDIT_NAME, A_File_SRC, FLEVEL FROM(SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.BID, B.BNAME, B.BOPEN_STATUS, B.BINTRO, M.MID, M.MNAME, C.CNAME, BOD.BOARDID, BOD.BCONTENT, BOD.BDATE, P.PID, P.EDIT_NAME, P.FTYPE, P.FILE_SRC, AT.FID, AT.EDIT_NAME as A_EDIT_NAME, AT.FILE_SRC as A_File_SRC, AT.FLEVEL, ROWNUM FROM BAND B JOIN BOARDS BOD ON(BOD.BID = B.BID) JOIN MEMBER M ON(BOD.MID = M.MID) JOIN CATEGORY C ON(B.CID = C.CID) JOIN PROFILE P ON(B.BID = P.BID) RIGHT JOIN ATTFILE AT ON(AT.BOARDID = BOD.BOARDID) WHERE B.BOPEN_STATUS != 'PRV' AND B.BSTATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BDATE DESC ) )
OR UPPER(BCONTENT) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{item}) ||'%'
SELECT BANID, BID, MID, BANREASON FROM BAN WHERE BANTYPE != 'MB'

SELECT MEMBERCOUNT, BNAME, MID FROM BAND B JOIN (SELECT COUNT(MB.MID) AS MEMBERCOUNT, MB.BID FROM MEMBER_BAND MB GROUP BY MB.BID ORDER BY MB.BID ASC) C ON (C.BID = B.BID) JOIN (SELECT M.MID, MB.BID FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEMBER_BAND MB ON (M.MID = MB.MID) WHERE M.MID = #{mid}) MY ON (MY.BID = B.BID)
